content: The Buddha's Eyeballs are one of the first Key Items you will come across during your time in Yellow Wind Ridge in Black Myth: Wukong. These eyeballs are scattered around the land on the heads of Buddha statues. With six to find, chances are you might miss one or two in your travels across the area. Plus, when it comes to using the Buddha's Eyeballs, it can be tricky to find out what to do.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Eyeball_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Eyeball Locations'.
The content is as follows:
The Buddha's Eyeballs are one of the first Key Items you will come across during your time in Yellow Wind Ridge in Black Myth: Wukong. These eyeballs are scattered around the land on the heads of Buddha statues. With six to find, chances are you might miss one or two in your travels across the area. Plus, when it comes to using the Buddha's Eyeballs, it can be tricky to find out what to do.
